name: XOOX - The grotesque dungeon crawler - OBG
name_original: XOOX - The grotesque dungeon crawler - OBG
description:
A One Button Game being made in the context of my studies at Isart Digital.

Everything was made by myself (including the graphics and sounds, but not the musical material. Cryo Chamber made the music)

I suggest playing through all 3 levels before trying out the infinite mode.

Have fun!
